data.text:
Access essential information and resources for West Valley College on the go.

WVC Go is the official mobile app for West Valley College providing on the go access to essential information. Stay connected with WVC wherever you are.

Features include:

My Web Services

View and register for classes, check final grades and holds, view student account balance and weekly class schedule.

Library

View library catalogs, OneSearch, hours, and resources.

Canvas

View course news & announcements, grades, and assignments

Athletics

News, schedules, and social feeds to keep you in the game.

Maps

Discover West Valley points of interest including buildings, departments, services, parking, dining, and more.

Calendar

Find all events taking place virtually and on campus, as well as important academic dates and deadlines.

Parking

Purchase parking permits and find the closest parking lot to your classes.

Online Services

Meet with counselors and staff in real-time using Cranium Cafe by ConexEd.

Emergency

Receive notifications for campus alerts and key emergency contact information

WVC Go is constantly improving its features. We encourage your feedback.
